justification: Offer benefits A’s stability goals but ignores B’s beliefs and needs. B is 0-8, values consistency and healthy players, and would be asked to give up their most reliable RB and a steadier QB for an injured, high-variance QB and a volatile WR. Little evidence of modeling B’s priorities or urgency; rationale is generic and self-focused. Trade is feasible but contextually misaligned with B’s incentives.
